# Book.FindAccountByFullName method

Finds an account or throws an exception. If you don't want it to throw, use the TryXXX version.

```csharp
public Account FindAccountByFullName(params string[] names)
```

## Return Value

The account.

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| AccountNotFoundException | Throws when the specified account can't be found. |
